1.12.2.1.0.0:
Full Release!
Added Server-Side support.
Completely ripped off the old Mod Options menu, all carpet rules can now be handled using the /carpet command similar to carpetmod.

New carpet rules ported:

    Carpet commandline settings and forgedcarpet.conf support
    All the commands except /player command have been ported
    None of the carpet rules require a restart to enable/disable
    WatchDogFix
    CtrlQCraftingFix
    TickingAreas
    DisableSpawnChunks
    TileTickLimit
    StackableEmptyShulkerBoxes
    FillLimits and FillUpdates
    CarpetProfiler support

Fixes for old rules:

    Fixed pistonGhostBlocksfix breaking caterpillar engines
    FlippinCactus works with stairs and other blocks now

This version is not compatible with liteloader

  updates are available.
  
Fixes:
- Fixed profiler crash in nether

1.12.2.1.2.0:
ForgedCarpet-1.2.0
v1.2.0 of ForgedCarpet is now out!
With it comes a bunch of bugfixes, features and a way smoother game experience ;)

Changes in 1.2.0 :
- Carpet rules should now load properly when changing worlds.
- Newlight shouldn't lag the game now.
- Removed disableSpawnChunks, tickingAreas, tileTickLimit, commandRNG, commandStructure. (Lemme know if u wanted any of these rules)
- `shulkerSpawningInEndCities` to allow shulkers to spawn withing end city bounding boxes.
- `antiCheatSpeed` option to disable various server side movement limits towards the cheaty players.
- `/carpet carpets` to give non-op players access to certain carpet commands.
- `relaxedBlockPlacement` to allow players to place pumpkins and fence gates in mid air.
- `explosionNoBlockDamage` to disable tnt explosion damage.
- `rotatorBlock` to rotate blocks via dispenser with a cactus.
- `customMOTD` to change server MOTD ingame.
- `railPowerLimit` to change the power limit for rails.
- `desertShrubs` can form when trying to plant saplings in arid climates without water nearby.
- `renewableSponges` via summoning a lightning on a regular guardians and converting them to elder guardians.
- `xpNoCooldown` to make players absorb xp instantly.
- `portalCreativeDelay` -> Portals won't let a creative player go through instantly andHolding obsidian in either hand won't let you
   through at all.
- Backend changes.
